content.data: This link will create a .csv file, for each material used, that the Barbaric Material Handler can read to help with loading of materials onto a machine. All materials that are to be used will need to have a unique ID assigned to them in the Material parameters of CABINET VISION. By default the name of the ID parameter is _mhid, but you can change this to whatever you want it to be and then just define what the parameter name should be in this links output section.
